products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Explore our collection of quality products

hero.title: A Calm Beginning to Protecting What Matters
hero.description: The gold itself becomes more than metal. It becomes a symbol of responsibility, long-term thinking, and self-trust. Not because someone pushed them to buy, but because the decision finally made sense.

luxury.title: The Pinnacle of Luxury
luxury.description: Gold is more than an asset—it is a symbol of enduring security and a legacy for the future. As your premier partner in precious metals, KISAGOLD offers gold bars of the highest purity, meticulously crafted to protect your wealth across generations. Indulge in privileged access to secure storage, premium buyback options, and personalized portfolio services beyond compare.

noProducts.title: No Products Found

contact.address: Prosperity Tower 21F, Kawasan District 8, SCBD Lot. 13 Jl. Jend. Sudirman Kav. 52-53, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia

verify.title:
Verify the Authenticity of
Your KISA24
verify.description: Enter your Kisa24 Gold Serial Number below to authenticate your gold through our exclusive verification system, ensuring its provenance and prestige.

values.physicalSecurity: Precision magnetic closure, tamper-evident hologram seal
values.digitalSecurity: Unique serial code, private key, QR code verifiable through Kisagold online authentication platform
values.quality: Produced by SNI-licensed refinery, verified by certified assayer. Lifetime buyback guaranteed by PT Kisa Mulia Abadi.

shopByCategory.title: Shop By Category
shopByCategory.description: We offer the most competitive pricing in the market — without sacrificing quality, service, or authenticity. Our best price guarantee ensures you receive unrivaled value, whether you're expanding your collection or making your first investment in gold.

classic99.title: KISA24 Classic 99.99%
classic99.description: SNI-certified gold bar with 99.99% purity. Protected with advanced physical & digital security features and lifetime buyback guarantee from PT Kisa Mulia Abadi.

classic24k.title: KISA24 Classic 24K
classic24k.description: Gold bar with 99.00% purity. Protected with advanced physical & digital security features and lifetime buyback guarantee from PT Kisa Mulia Abadi.

custom.title: KISA24 Custom
custom.description: Make any celebration truly extraordinary with personalized, ready-to-wear pieces. Protected with advanced physical & digital security features and lifetime buyback guarantee from PT Kisa Mulia Abadi.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: From the hands of artisan makers to yours, be the first to know when we launch our newest collection. Be prepared to fall in love.

goldenBond.title: Golden Bond
goldenBond.description: From your hands to theirs—a gift that never loses its shine. A legacy that lasts for generations.

productSelection.title: Product Selection
productSelection.description: Every KISA24 gold bar is fully traceable—from its geological origin in Papua to its final refinement and delivery. The entire process is carried out by our licensed affiliated entities, ensuring provenance at every step.
